<MYNAME>, thank you for joining the Farm
Revival Committee. Starting this month,
we will send your farm evaluation on
the <RED>13th and 28th</RED> of every month.
You may get other committee letters,
so we hope you find them informative.

The Farm Revival Committee

<MYNAME>, welcome to <GREEN>Echo Village</GREEN>.
We send letters to inform you of store
products. <RED>You may get letters from other
stores</RED> as well, so be sure to read them.

Hana's General Store sells seeds, so
please come and see us soon.

- Hana

Hello, <MYNAME>.
The amount you made from shipping last
month was <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE> G.
Please keep working hard.

Emma the Shipper

Hello, <MYNAME>.
The amount you made from shipping
last month was <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE> G.
Please keep working hard.

Emma the Shipper

Hello, <MYNAME>.
The amount you made from shipping last
month was <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE> G.
Please keep working hard.

Emma the Shipper

We've just received <GREEN>Onion Seeds</GREEN>
and <GREEN>Tomato Seeds</GREEN>! 
Also just in are bright summer flower
seeds, be sure to stop by and see them.

Summer starts at the <GREEN>General Store</GREEN>!

- Hana's General Store

Fall is all about reading, sports,
and food! Just in, <RED>fall vegetable seeds</RED>!
Eat fall vegetables to build up stamina
for the coming cold season.

Stock up at the <GREEN>General Store</GREEN>!

- Hana's General Store

Nothing better than hot pot in weather!
We've got the perfect seeds for crops
to make that dish that warms your body
from the core. Don't miss out!

For your winter crop needs, there's no
better place than the <GREEN>General Store</GREEN>!

- Hana's General Store

New crop seeds have arrived! We also
have the usual items　as well.　Please
stop by any time.

For your crop needs, visit the
<GREEN>General Store</GREEN>!

- Hana's General Store

New items have arrived!　Stop by and
check out the selection.　Get here
early before they run out!

For general goods, visit the
<GREEN>General Store</GREEN>!

- Hana's General Store

A new blueprint is ready! You can only
get it here.　Do come and take a look.

Great blueprints at <GREEN>Rebecca's Designs</GREEN>!

◆Rebecca's Designs◆

I created a new hairstyle to commemorate
the expansion of the town. Even I am
shocked how it turned out this time!
If you've got the courage,
come down to <GREEN>Allen's Salon</GREEN>.

◆Allen' Salon◆

New clothing designs are ready.　Every
single one is a carefully　handcrafted
design.

I look forward to your visit.

Tailor
Open: <BLUE>Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays</BLUE>
Hours: <BLUE>10 AM to 6 PM</BLUE>

New clothing designs are ready.

Popular designs from around the world.
How about it?

I will be overjoyed
if everyone likes them.

◆Tailor◆

New clothing designs are ready.

Haven't you ever wanted to become one
of the animals in town or in the forest?
My hard work has made that possible.

I hope everyone will find
them interesting.
◆Tailor◆

A new tool for taking care of animals
has arrived.　Stop by if you need one.

Neil's Animals
Open: <BLUE>Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu</BLUE>
Hours: <BLUE>10 AM to 6 PM</BLUE>

☆Limited Time Only☆
<GREEN>Land of the East walking tours</GREEN>
on sale!　Just right for solo
trips, couple　trips and　family
trips.

Don't let this chance slip away!

- Camellia Travel

☆Limited Time Only☆
<GREEN>Southern Island travel </GREEN>on sale!
If you want a relaxing time,　don't let
this chance slip away!

- Camellia Travel

☆Limited Time Only☆
<GREEN>Snow land tours in the far north</GREEN>
on sale! You can do all the ice-fishing
you want and take in the unusual
scenery.

Don't let this chance slip away!

- Camellia Travel

☆Limited Time Only☆
Believe it or not <GREEN>Ancient Roman journeys</GREEN>
are on sale! This is your chance to go!
Visit rainbow islands, native dwellings,
mysterious stone slabs and old towers.

▼Camellia Travel▼

A new animal has arrived.
It seems to be popular in other areas.

●Neil's Animals●
Business days: <BLUE>Mon, Tue, Wed, Thurs</BLUE>
Business hours: <BLUE>10:00 to 18:00</BLUE>
Currently unused.
Currently unused.

A new animal has arrived.
More delicate than the others so far.

Neil's Animals
Open: <BLUE>Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu</BLUE>
Hours: <BLUE>10 AM to 6 PM</BLUE>

We've got new pets!

They're all waiting for you
with their cute little faces!
Do come and see them!

Rod's Pets
Open: <BLUE>Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu</BLUE>
Hours: <BLUE>10 AM to 6 PM</BLUE>

Rod's Pets has got pets
in a new color!
I recommend...
They're all cute, I recommend them all.
Do come and see them!

●Rod's Pets●

I've thought up a new menu. It's a
very tasty dish using only high-class
ingredients. I just know you'll be
satisfied! I'll be waiting to see you.

Chez Clement
Open: <BLUE>Mon, Wed, Thu, Sat, Sun</BLUE>
Hours: <BLUE>10 AM to 6 PM</BLUE>

We've started a new set menu. We have
three highly flavorful sets. They'll
perk you up when you are tired at an
affordable price, so please stop by.

- Tea House

I've discovered a rare item. All that
running around was worth it. I'll sell
it to you for a special price.
You won't regret it...Hyahyahya.

●Sandra's Stall●
Open: <BLUE>Fridays, Saturdays, Sundays</BLUE>
Hours: <BLUE>7 PM to 10 PM</BLUE>

The 24th of Summer, a <GREEN>Fireworks Festival</GREEN>
will be held in Forget-Me-Not Valley.

We the Pyrotechnic Twins are going
to show our skills to the whole world.
Why don't you come see these fireworks?
It will be the show of a generation!

- Kassey & Patrick

I'm Barney, head of a circus troupe in 
Forget-Me-Not Valley!

I'm recruiting troupe members.
Athletic people! Courageous people!
Run a circus together with us!
I'll be waiting to hear from you.

- Circus Troupe Leader Barney

A island full of sprites recently
surfaced near Sunshine Islands. The
sprites do various things to help,
making our farms prosper.

How are your farms getting along?

- Taro, Sunshine Islands

A fiery mining island has surfaced.
<RED>We get lots of ore from the mine</RED>.
Thanks to that, our town is lively.

How's your town?

- Taro, Sunshine Islands

A mushroom island has surfaced.
We pick lots of mushrooms there.
And now we can raise pigs as well!

What is it like in your area?

- Taro, Sunshine Islands

A medium-sized bazaar will be held in
Zephyr Town!

We don't call it an ancient bazaar, but
the number of customers is increasing.
We plan to make our town even better.
This is the best time to participate!

- Felix, Mayor of Zephyr Town

The largest bazaar on the continent
will be held in Zephyr Town!

It will be lively enough
to rival the golden age of bazaars!
<RED>And it's in our beloved town</RED>.
How are things going in your town?

- Felix, Mayor of Zephyr Town

My name is Ivan and
I live in Zephyr Town.

Does your child struggle with studies?
<RED>All they want to do is have fun</RED>.
Well, in my hands, every lesson can
be fun and fulfilling.

- Ivan, Personal Tutor, Zephyr Town

Cooking Festival, held the 21st of Fall.
This year's theme is "Main Course"!
As usual, the judge will be Pierre the
food critic. Held on the mountain peak
next to Bluebell Village. Be careful on
the way, the path is full of wild
animals.

- Rutger, Bluebell Village Mayor

If you need to expand a building,
your land, or anything to do with
carpentry, I take on any and all jobs.

But be careful. You need to prepare
a certain amount of raw materials.

- Irene, Bluebell Village

Cooking Festival held 28th of Summer.
This year's theme is "Dessert"! As
usual, the judge will be Pierre the
food critic. Held on the mountain peak
next to Bluebell Village. Be careful on
the way, the path is full of wild
animals.

- Ina, Mayor of Konohana Village

My name is Mako, and I do plant
research in Konohana Village.

I am searching for new plants for
my next exhibition. If you have any
or know of any, please ship them so they
can spread around. I'm counting on you.

- Mako, Botanist, Konohana Village

Fishing Promotion Committee request!
A lot of people enjoy going fishing,
but we want to promote it even more.

Please <RED>fish a lot</RED> in your area! 
If you do, we will send <GREEN>peaches</GREEN>
to your town to show our gratitude.

- Fishing Promotion Committee

Crop Promotion Committee request!
<GREEN>Marguerites</GREEN> and <GREEN>Red Roses</GREEN> are so popular
right now that there's a shortage.

To thank any regions that <RED>ship</RED> them,
we will provide them with <GREEN>Pink Roses</GREEN>.

- Crop Promotion Committee

Crop Promotion Committee request!
<GREEN>Snowdrops </GREEN>and <GREEN>Nadeshiko</GREEN> are so popular
right now that there's a shortage.

To thank any regions that <RED>ship</RED> them,
we will provide them with <GREEN>Gentians</GREEN>.

- Crop Promotion Committee

The best summer dessert is <GREEN>Watermelon</GREEN>!
If I ship a few more summer vegetables,
I bet I'll be able to get some.

That's why I want you, <MYNAME>, to <RED>ship
all the summer vegetables</RED>. Could you do
that? Don't worry if you can't.

- Hana, Hana's General Store

<GREEN>Green Peppers</GREEN> are a colorful fall crop!
If I ship a few more fall vegetables,
I bet I'll be able to get some

It's why I want you, <MYNAME>, <RED>to ship all
the fall vegetables</RED>. Could you do that?
Don't worry if you can't.

- Hana, Hana's General Store

How are you, <MYNAME>? I know this is
sudden, but can you help the town and
farm more? If you <RED>ship a lot of</RED> crops
and fish, I'll provide you with <GREEN>tea</GREEN>
and <GREEN>apples</GREEN>.

- The Farm Revival Committee

How are you, <MYNAME>?

I know this is sudden, but could you
make the town and farm prosperous?
If you construct buildings and
<RED>get residents</RED>, I'll give you
<GREEN>Bay Leaf</GREEN> and <GREEN>Bergamot</GREEN>.

- The Farm Revival Committee

Intro a tour from Promotion Committee.

It's a tour to a place you can now
visit: the <GREEN>Southern Island Travels</GREEN>!
This comes with <RED>Oranges</RED> as a bonus! You
can have a trip you'll love and
get an item you'll love receiving.

- The Travel Promotion Committee

I heard about this on an earlier trip,
but it seems there is a <GREEN>Blue Rose</GREEN>
somewhere in this world. As a farm
owner, you want it, don't you? If you
do, you should take a chance and
<RED>exchange items with me</RED>...

- Sandra

Request from the Promotion Committee!

There is a shortage of <GREEN>wheat</GREEN> right now,
and it poses a real problem.

To thank any regions that <RED>ship</RED> them,
we will give them <GREEN>grapes</GREEN>.

- The Crop Promotion Committee

Request from the Promotion Committee!

There's a shortage of <GREEN>Cherries</GREEN>
right now.

To thank any regions that <RED>ship</RED> them,
We will provide them with <GREEN>Kiwis</GREEN>.

- The Crop Promotion Committee

Hopes of the development of your farm,
<MYNAME>, we are giving you the title of
